theChaser:Shadow In Necklace.NAME: Shadowed Necklace
theChaser:Shadow In Necklace.FLAVOR: A necklace with a small glass bottle, created from the abyssal darkness.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, apply #b2 #yTargeting to a random enemy.

theChaser:Cloak Of Assassin.NAME: Assassin's Cloak
theChaser:Cloak Of Assassin.FLAVOR: This mass-produced cloak boasts the most reliable camouflage.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, #yHide for #b2 turns.

theChaser:R-B0-7.NAME: R-B0-7
theChaser:R-B0-7.FLAVOR: A dangerous secret weapon. Its lethality is complemented with an infamous drug.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each turn, enemies which have debuffs lose #b5 #yHP.

theChaser:Broken Ticker.NAME: Broken Ticker
theChaser:Broken Ticker.FLAVOR: It is already broken, yet a faint ticking can still be heard.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, apply #ySlow to ALL enemies.

theChaser:Scoch Stone.NAME: Scotch Stone
theChaser:Scoch Stone.FLAVOR: A fine-grained grey stone used for sharpening weapons.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you deal damage by triggering #yTargeting, deal #b1 additional damage.

theChaser:Letter Of Request.NAME: Letter of Request
theChaser:Letter Of Request.FLAVOR: A letter of request from an unknown client.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, apply #b3 #yTargeting to ALL enemies.

theChaser:Shadow In Mask.NAME: Masked Shadows
theChaser:Shadow In Mask.FLAVOR: Behind a mask, nobody can see the abyss.
DESCRIPTIONS: Replaces #pShadowed #pNecklace. At the start of your turn, apply #b1 #yTargeting to ALL enemies and trigger #yTargeting once.

theChaser:Pocket Knife.NAME: Pocket Knife
theChaser:Pocket Knife.FLAVOR: A portable knife used to cut ropes.
DESCRIPTIONS: After #yTarget is triggered for the fourth time each turn, gain [E] .

theChaser:Acid Solution.NAME: Acid Solution
theChaser:Acid Solution.FLAVOR: Extremely corrosive. Hopefully no one else carelessly sprinkles this on something...or someone.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you play an Attack, if you are #yWeak, apply #b1 #yWeak to the enemy. If you are #yFrail, remove all Block from the enemy.

theChaser:Box Cutter.NAME: Box Cutter
theChaser:Box Cutter.FLAVOR: A very peculiar sword. So peculiar, that its purpose is unknown.
DESCRIPTIONS: Your first Attack that triggers #yTargeting each turn triggers it #btwice.

theChaser:Rusty Helmet.NAME: Rusty Helmet
theChaser:Rusty Helmet.FLAVOR: An old helmet used in wars of the past. It's unlikely to see use today.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each turn, apply #b1 #yBlindsided to ALL enemies.
